channel.title: TCP on wubigo
channel.description: Recent content in TCP on wubigo

item.title: Tcpdump Windows
item.description: install winpcap and windump https://www.winpcap.org list all interfaces windump -D dump on interface windump -i 1 -n dst host 172.17.17.6 See entire packet payload using tcpdump windump -nnvvXSs 1514 -i 1 -n dst host 172.17.17.6
